org.eeml.math.equation

Class QuadraticEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eeml.math.equation.QuadraticEquation

  • public class QuadraticEquation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mainly implements quadratic equation. It provides methods like getSolution. Maintained by EEML. see more on eeml.github.io
    Since:
    v1.0.0
    Author:
    EULIR
    See Also:
    org.eeml.math;

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadraticEquation(int a, int b, int c)
      form the quadratic equation in the form of ax^2+bx+c=0 where a as the highest coefficient cannot be zero.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuadraticEquation

        public QuadraticEquation(int a,
                         int b,
                         int c)
        form the quadratic equation in the form of ax^2+bx+c=0 where a as the highest coefficient cannot be zero.
        Parameters:
        a - coefficient of quadratic term
        b - coefficient of linear term
        c - constant coefficient
        Throws:
        HighestCoefficientBeZeroException - when a equals zero.
